unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent! Companies like TCS and Infosys regularly visit IIT Bombay. We need robust pre-placement talks scheduled by 10:00 hrs, 26/01/2024. Focusing on diverse colleges across Tamil Nadu helps. Stipends of Rs. 30,000 - Rs. 50,000 are competitive. Let's aim for 100+ hires before Diwali, 1/11/2024. Good luck to all! Final selection lists on 30/06/2024.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent! Companies like T C S and Infosys regularly visit I I T Bombay. We need robust pre-placement talks scheduled by ten hours, twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. Focusing on diverse colleges across Tamil Nadu helps. Stipends of rupees thirty thousand to rupees fifty thousand are competitive. Let's aim for one hundred plus hires before Diwali, first November two thousand and twenty four. Good luck to all! Final selection lists on thirtieth June two thousand and twenty four.
